channel.title: Time Series on Timi's RStudio Tutorials
channel.description: Recent content in Time Series on Timi's RStudio Tutorials

item.title: Time Series
item.description: Firstly, we bring in the libraries and turn off the warning messages library(Lahman) library(sqldf) library(ggplot2) Now, we extract the required data, in this case, that is query<-“SELECT yearID,HR FROM Batting WHERE playerID=‘ruthba01’” result<-sqldf(query) Visualizing the Data ggplot()+ geom_line(data=result,aes(x=yearID,y=HR))+ geom_point(data=result,aes(x=yearID,y=HR))+ ggtitle(“Ruth’s Homerun Totals Through Years”)+ xlab(“Year”)+ ylab(“Homeruns”)
